instruction: Visualize this quote in a design.
input: Quote: “Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.”
output: A design that features clouds painted in a light blue color with one cloud shaded in a bright yellow. In its center lies a single sun radiating gracious beams of sunshine. At the bottom of the visusal there will be a quote saying "Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine."
